author: Linus Tech Tips
description:
Thanks to Sharge for sponsoring this video! Go to URL to check out their Disk Pro!

Use code LTT25 and get $20 off Hetzner Object Storage at https://htznr.li/LTT2512

Have you ever wondered what kind of TV you can get for $30? How about $30,000? Well today we're answering that question for you as we look at those price points and a few in between from brands like Samsung, TCL, Hisense, and Insignia.

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1628523-30-vs-30000-tv/

Check out the TVs from the video:
Insignia 32" F20 Series LED 720p Fire TV: https://geni.us/ATlbB9
Roku 55R4C5 55" 4K LED TV: https://geni.us/EotUSOA
Samsung 83” S85F Series 4K OLED TV: https://geni.us/I3khwdK
Hisense 116" UX Series RGB-MiniLED 4K Google TV: https://geni.us/uInm

NVIDIA SHIELD Android TV Pro 16GB 4K HDR Streaming Device: https://geni.us/Onik

Check out our Channel Partners:

title: $30 vs $30,000 TV
